metadata.title: CVE-2024-27434 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:wifi: iwlwifi: mvm: don't set the MFP flag for the GTKThe firmware doesn't need the MFP flag for the GTK, it can even make thefirmware crash. in case the AP is configured with: group cipher TKIP andMFPC. We would send the GTK with cipher = TKIP and MFP which is of coursenot possible.
